001package aufgabe5;
002
003/**
004 *  Class that holds note and all utility methods.
005 */
006public final class Note {
007    private int note;
008
009    /**
010     * Best grade.
011     */
012    public static final Note BESTE = new Note(1);
013
014    /**
015     * Worst grade.
016     */
017    public static final Note SCHLECHTESTE = new Note(5);
018
019    /**
020     * Private constructor.
021     * @param note to set
022     */
023    private Note(int note) {
024        this.note = note;
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Create new Note object by int value.
029     * @param note what note Note should have
030     * @return newly created object
031     */
032    public static Note valueOf(int note) {
033        switch (note) {
034        case 10:
035        case 13:
036        case 17:
037        case 20:
038        case 23:
039        case 27:
040        case 30:
041        case 33:
042        case 37:
043        case 40:
044        case 50:
045            return new Note(note);
046        default:
047            throw new  IllegalArgumentException("unzulaessige Note " + note);
048        }
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Create new Note object by String value.
053     * @param note what note Note should have
054     * @return newly created object
055     */
056    public static Note valueOf(String note) {
057        switch (note) {
058        case "1,0":
059        case "1,3":
060        case "1,7":
061        case "2,0":
062        case "2,3":
063        case "2,7":
064        case "3,0":
065        case "3,3":
066        case "3,7":
067        case "4,0":
068        case "5,0":
069            return new Note(Integer.parseInt(note.replace(",", "")));
070        default:
071            throw new  IllegalArgumentException("unzulaessige Note " + note);
072        }
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Returns note as int.
077     * @return note as int
078     */
079    public int intValue() {
080        return this.note;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Check if note passed.
085     * @return true if passed, else false
086     */
087    public boolean istBestanden() {
088        return this.note <= 40;
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Make note value to string.
093     * @return string variant of note
094     */
095    @Override
096    public String toString() {
097        return this.note / 10 + "," + this.note % 10;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Check if two Note objects are equal.
102     * @param o second object to check
103     * @return true if equal
104     */
105    @Override
106    public boolean equals(Object o) {
107        if (o instanceof Note) {
108            Note that = (Note) o;
109            return this.note == that.note;
110        }
111        return false;
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Create hashcode with note value.
116     * @return note
117     */
118    @Override
119    public int hashCode() {
120        return this.note;
121    }
122
123
124}
